metadata.synopsis: Non crit-path. This goblin is recounting stories of her last raid and displaying a wound. It's less a cause of pain than a subject for boasting.

0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Nass
0.text: Aye? Little busy bleedin', if y'don't mind.
0.context: NodeContext: Impatient rather than outright hostile.

5.speaker: Sharp-Eye Nass
5.text: Seen this mess? Flamin' Fist thuggo took a chunk outta me arm last raid out.
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: She's holding her arm up to playerNodeContext: Speaks to the player slightly more as an equal - they've been accepted into the camp thus far, after all. She's displaying a nasty wound

10.speaker: Player
10.text: Why show me? Go find a healer.

1.speaker: Sharp-Eye Nass
1.text: Tried the priest, but she says the Absolute'll set me right in time for the next raid.

6.speaker: Sharp-Eye Nass
6.text: That last inn we 'it. They were guardin' some uppity noble 'n his friends.
6.context: NodeContext: Almost bored at the story - she's describing an incident of great significance to you but she only cares about the fight and the spoils it brings

9.speaker: Sharp-Eye Nass
9.text: Not very well, mind. Drow carried him off, left the real spoils to us.
9.context: NodeContext: Snorting, derisive. Both of the mercenaries who couldn't put up a fight, and of the fact that the drow only cared about taking hostages, leave the real valuables (in her eyes) behind

7.speaker: Sharp-Eye Nass
7.text: Not very well, mind. Yer drow pals carried him off, left the real spoils to us.
7.context: NodeContext: Snorting, derisive. Both of the mercenaries who couldn't put up a fight, and of the fact that the drow only cared about taking hostages, leave the real valuables (in her eyes) behind

11.speaker: Player
11.text: You're lucky to be alive. The Baldurian militia are fierce warriors.

4.speaker: Sharp-Eye Nass
4.text: Fiercest thing about 'em was the wailing, 'til we put an end to it.
4.context: NodeContext: Dismissive - you've suggested she should have been more afraid of fierce mercenaries, but she's unimpressed.

2.speaker: Sharp-Eye Nass
2.text: Ain't none can stand against us now. Not with the Absolute in our corner.
2.context: NodeContext: Absolute confidence, certainty - she devoutly believes in this new god and their dominance is a foregone conclusion.

8.speaker: Sharp-Eye Nass
8.text: Can feel the Absolute pullin' me flesh back togevver. Tickles.
8.context: NodeContext: In awe, imagining that her god is healing her as she speaks. 'Tickles' is delivered in thoughtful surprise.
